definitions.definition: a man or boy with the same parents as another person:
examples: Do you have any brothers and sisters?

definitions.definition: a man who is a member of the same group as you or who shares an interest with you or has a similar way of thinking to you:
examples: [ as form of address ] "Let us unite, brothers and fight this unjust law!"

definitions.definition: sometimes used by a black man to address or refer to another black man
used as the title of a man, such as a monk, who belongs to a religious organization:
examples: Brother Michael and Brother John were deep in conversation.
